I have seen a lot of Mr Beast video's and wanted to say thank you for all you have done for all who need it. I say in SA and have had a hard life and have lived on the streets please can I join one of your challenges, all money I might make will go towards helping the ones who really need it, people that are still living on the streets, some of the ones that helped me and did all they could to keep me safe. I'm still on the road to recovery but every second of every day I think about the ones that are not as Lucky. If I ever get on my feet all my time will go towards helping others get on there feet.
